artist: Engraver: William Blake; Designer: John Flaxman R.A.; Publisher: Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London
creditline: The James and Maureen Duffey Endowment for Prints and Drawings, the Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books, and gift of funds from Gary O'Brien
description: bound album of print illustrations; blue and black cover with black leather with gold printing; images are line drawing style, without shading; Classical scenes of gods and humans; 37 plates
inscription:
Inscription

inside front cover, in brown ink: [To / Miss Annie J. Silsbee / Dec 25, 1865.]
provenance: (Thomas French Fine Art, Fairlawn, Ohio); sold to MIA, 2012.
title: Compositions from the Works, Days and Theogony of Hesiod
